mapper.insert: insert into r_match_type (uuid, is_del, creater, updater, create_time, update_time, match_name, match_type, muti_amount, remark) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{matchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mutiAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select uuid, is_del, creater, updater, create_time, update_time, match_name, match_type, muti_amount, remark from r_match_type
